Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway raises Amazon stake by 11% @CNBC #BerkshireHathaway $brk #amazon $amzn #bankstocks #banks #BankOfAmerica

$BRK upped its stake in $amzn by 11%, #BerkshireHathaway revealed in a government filing Wednesday. Berkshire now owns 537,300 shares of #Amazon, worth $947 Mil. The holdings are as of the end of the 2ndQ@WarrenBuffett @JeffBezos

Agree about long term.But, is it a good time to load on $BRK-B before upcoming #Recession?With 2 new #BerkshireHathaway managers loading on overvalued stocks like $AMZN it's more likely for $BRK to lose 50% of its value like  they did during 2008 #Recession

$BRK market cap is $529B.  If you subtract cash $128B and equities of $232B, you effectively own all of the #BerkshireHathaway operating entities for ~$170 billion.  $19.5B of YTD operating earnings for 9 months or ~$26B annualized.  $AAPL $BAC $WFC $AXP $USB $JPM $KO $DAL $LUV
